title: Which famous singers are known for their raspy voice? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to me Steven Tyler and Hank Williams but there are many others… My vocal coach/ trainer/ tutor always encourages me to use all the techniques that she teaches me, to put it all into practice. I love to experiment and I love to listen to yodel…. I love a raspy and a husky voiced singer. But I also love singers like Shirley Bassey, Carpenters, Engelbert, Perry Como, John Denver to name a few… I think, it’s a great feeling to know you have a wonderful voice, but you don’t just want it to be wonderful, you want to do something amazing with that wonderful voice.. !!!! Use it to create a difference, do something unique… Hope this helps

Famous Singers that are known for their Raspy Voice include: Adele  Louis Armstrong  Pat Benatar  Jon Bon Jovi  Kim Carnes  Kelly Clarkson  Kurt Cobain  Joe Cocker  Alice Cooper  Melissa Etheridge  Macy Gray  Janis Joplin  Stevie Nicks  Pink  Rod Stewart  Tina Turner  Bonnie Tyler  Steven Tyler  Tom Waits  Amy Winehouse
